spells.name: Animal Messenger
spells.description: Sends a Tiny animal to a specific place.

spells.name: Animal Trance
spells.description: Fascinates 2d6 HD of animals.

spells.name: Barkskin
spells.description: Grants +2 (or higher) enhancement to natural armor.

spells.name: Bear's Endurance
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Con for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Bull's Strength
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Cat's Grace
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Dex for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Chill Metal
spells.description: Cold metal damages those who touch it.

spells.name: Delay Poison
spells.description: Stops poison from harming subject for 1 hour/level.

spells.name: Fire Trap
spells.description: Opened object deals 1d4 + 1/level damage.

spells.name: Flame Blade
spells.description: Touch attack deals 1d8 + 1/two levels damage.

spells.name: Flaming Sphere
spells.description: Rolling ball of fire deals 3d6 fire damage.

spells.name: Fog Cloud
spells.description: Fog obscures vision.

spells.name: Gust of Wind
spells.description: Blows away or knocks down smaller creatures.

spells.name: Heat Metal
spells.description: Makes metal so hot it damages those who touch it.

spells.name: Hold Animal
spells.description: Paralyzes one animal for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Owl's Wisdom
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Wis for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Reduce Animal
spells.description: Shrinks one willing animal.

spells.name: Resist Energy
spells.description: Ignores 10 or more points of damage per attack from specified energy type.

spells.name: Restoration, Lesser
spells.description: Dispels magical ability penalty or repairs 1d4 ability damage.

spells.name: Soften Earth and Stone
spells.description: Turns stone to clay, or dirt to sand or mud.

spells.name: Spider Climb
spells.description: Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings.

spells.name: Summon Nature's Ally II
spells.description: Summons creature to fight.

spells.name: Summon Swarm
spells.description: Summons swarm of bats, rats, or spiders.

spells.name: Tree Shape
spells.description: You look exactly like a tree for 1 hour/level.

spells.name: Warp Wood
spells.description: Bends wood.

spells.name: Wood Shape
spells.description: Reshapes wooden objects to suit you.
